sn37.16:1.1: “Pancahi, anuruddha, dhammehi samannagato matugamo kayassa bheda param marana sugatim saggam lokam upapajjati.
sn37.16:1.3: Saddho ca hoti, hirima ca hoti, ottappi ca hoti, anupanahi ca hoti, pannava ca hoti—
sn37.16:1.4: imehi kho, anuruddha, pancahi dhammehi samannagato matugamo kayassa bheda param marana sugatim saggam lokam upapajjati”ti.
